CustomField.description: -Provide account administration and user support including Active Directory, Email Exchange, File / Printer Servers, TrendMicro Anti-Virus Management Console, Wi-Fi, Telephony, Door Access Systems and etc. -Support systems activities on installation of servers, storage and server room facilities. -Support end-users Computing on Windows Operating Systems and MS Office Suite. -Ensure operating environment are secured and security patches are up-to-date. -Maximise computer system capabilities, and ensure constant updating, & improvement of existing programs by evaluating objectives and specifications, reviewing proposed changes, and making recommendations. -Test and evaluate new and latest software applications and update users on a routine basis
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Account administration and users support including Active Directory, Emails, File/Printer Servers, Anti-Virus Management, Wi-Fi, Telephony, Door Access Systems and MS Office etc. -Support systems activities on installation of servers, storage and server room facilities. -Ensure operating environment are secured & security patches are up-to-date. -Maximise computer system capabilities & ensure constant updating & improvement of programs, review & propose changes -Test & evaluate new/latest software
CustomField.label: IT Continuous Learning Update
